answerText: The Family of Pascual Duarte [or La Familia de Pascual Duarte][10] Camilo Jose Cela, the author of The Family of Pascual Duarte, set The Hive at the end of this war. This war is the setting for Ernest Hemingway's For Whom The Bell Tolls.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 19 | 3 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel has his first sexual experience with his wife by raping her on top of his brother Mario's grave. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose protagonist murders El Estirao, the lover of his sister Rosario and his wife Lola. It is written as two "found" letters written by the title character in prison.
